article.title: A $^{13}$CO Detection in a Brightest Cluster Galaxy

multiple_choice_question.text: Which velocity component of the 12CO emission lines in Figure 1 shows a significant counterpart in the 13CO(3-2) spectrum?
What is the approximate FWHM linewidth of the 13CO(3-2) emission line shown in Figure 2?
Based on Figure 3, where is the 13CO(3-2) emission primarily concentrated?
choices: Exclusively in the northwest diffuse extension
Near the brightest regions of the two main clumps
